text:
Good Afternoon, 

My name is Ellen Huynh and I am the business manager of Hazen High School’s FTC Robotics Team, the Scarabs. We compete in the FIRST Tech Challenge, an international robotics competition for students interested in STEM. Our team is run through Hazen High School in Renton, WA and is a student led club. 

Being in the same city as Boeing’s 737 Factory and many of their office buildings, as well as being surrounded by other aviation-related businesses such as Aviation Supplies and Academics, Inc., we know that our team works in a very important part of a region known for its role in modern technology. With this in mind, we pride ourselves in the fact that when we compete, we aren’t only representing our school, but rather, the entire community around us.

With that being said, we’re a small team and must operate from a small budget. Much of the funding we use to compete comes from generous sponsorships, and we’d love to have the support of a local company like yours with our goals this year! A donation of any size would be greatly appreciated. 

This team has provided many students with opportunities to learn valuable STEM and business skills in a competitive environment. Throughout our season we work together to design, build, and program a robot that can carry out tasks in competition with other teams. Not only that, similar to how ASA does in a way, we also work to spread knowledge of STEM within our community. We do this by providing middle school students a chance to not only learn more in programming and design but also to build robots of their own. This year we are so excited to be back in person, getting the opportunity to work together as a full team to prepare for competition.  

We would love to discuss what we can do to thank you for your support should you choose to donate. We would be happy to promote ASA on our social media and at our competitions. In the past we have appeared in our sponsor's promotional materials as well, please let us know what we can do for you. Feel free to look at our Instagram, <https://secure-web.cisco.com/1cJOjYnhoiMROdj6mR3LgUuS0EKKqboCHmx16ELSI2YhD__jqjEzUFeg8svodRh7f6q2LssE05OiMXlexDG6WXQO4Hx1PUjocX7n66RuQBPd0_Q7jTpgOW02YYKZXke6-wlPqINr9qSeUeOFowBwT5FtRxc3PiFgSSU66qlTq0EwmZq0SXr64Yi7fkODySRMRg1KMeydlaATQgf9mTA6bHC1dwrEMRHspYKOCL8Yz-uQ49xYjIlDiL8McsAY4kR873m8RvgjL_18a-Q4MXR42ZIgnybFAgUohmNRXqFlX8awlmcBFK2wCOzIaZ2Fwl8JiG2wThdchiHWGZT5ihn9rUTJXj_mEs7tBKrRkpO21y7G84xGc28xQxYgJFfIG_vwtqr057tgMgQppOqrzcguUeqnl9W0Y1PvlAKSrXp7cGKK0oCF9QNY7YaZD_SQi6gnK221j39DcgVIsER-LhWaYXg/https%3A%2F%2Fwww.instagram.com%2Fhazenrobotics%2F|@hazenrobotics>. 

Thanks in advance, 
*Ellen Huynh | Team 8693* 
<https://www.instagram.com/hazenrobotics/?hl=en|@hazenrobotics> 
<http://hazenrobotics.tech/|hazenrobotics.tech> 
1101 Hoquiam Ave NE, Renton, WA 98059
